channel.title: Global Drops
channel.description:
Hey, i saw in "config" globaldrops.cfg Like this: drop = 1923 3208 3214 1 0 2 Lumbridge Castle Bowl drop = 1931 3209 3214 1 0 2 Lumbridge Castle Pot
But why i dont see this whet i tele to the coords?
I got that to when i drop my items... when i drop my items the disapear!
Does some one now how to fix this or hava some sort of code that spawns items to? Like the way to create new items with addglobalobject......?

make sure u compile!
